token.title: Ultravioleta Token
token.description_1: $UVT is the governance and utility token of UltraVioleta DAO, which empowers holders to participate in decentralized decision-making and treasury management. It is used to vote on proposals, allocate community funds, and support member initiatives.
token.description_2: Through $UVT, the DAO maintains a transparent and democratic structure, ensuring that its resources are directed based on collective governance.
